benchmark_details.name: Anaphora Accessibility Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The dataset focuses on assessing discourse-level understanding in models through the task of anaphora accessibility, evaluating the ability to accurately reference entities introduced in discourse based on various linguistic constructions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and improve discourse understanding abilities of language models through the lens of anaphora accessibility.

data.source: Generated and manually inspected sentences based on theoretical constructions related to discourse and quantifier scope.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the probability assigned by models to specific continuations based on the context given.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores on relevant comparisons indicate better discourse understanding capabilities.
methodology.validation: Tests were validated through human participant comparisons on comprehension tasks.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Informed consent was obtained from participants for data collection.
